{{Description|Offer the Plumes of Purifying Light collected during your adventures to the Amrita Pool to obtain the blessings of the waters and trees|System Unlock: Vourukasha Oasis - Amrita Pool}}
'''The Gift of Amrita''' is an [[Offering System]] that is leveled with [[Plume of Purifying Light|Plumes of Purifying Light]]. It can be found at the [[Amrita Pool]] in [[Vourukasha Oasis]], [[Realm of Farakhkert]], [[Sumeru]].

The Gift of Amrita is unlocked by completing the {{Quest|Heart of Amrita}}.

After obtaining 30 Plumes, a ''"Reveal"'' button will appear on the interface, which will mark the location of an uncollected Plume.

|image3 = Tutorial Vourukasha Oasis - Amrita Pool 3.png
|text3  = When you obtain {{Color|help|30}} Plumes of Purifying Light, you will obtain a revelation from the Amrita Pool that will mark out the locations of the remaining Plumes.
}}

==Rewards==
Raising The Gift of Amrita's level requires {{Item|Plume of Purifying Light}} offered in groups of '''6'''. A total of '''36''' Plumes of Purifying Light are required to reach the maximum level. Reaching the maximum level will grant the {{Achievement|Alkanet Amrita}}.

The player receives each set of rewards once, their order is randomized.
